Package View

Class ModSelectionWindow

java.lang.Object
View.ModSelectionWindow
public class ModSelectionWindow extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ModSelectionWindow()
    Constructor: Constructs a new ModSelectionWindow which creates a dialog box in which the user selects the mods he wants to activate post-conditions The private field m_mode is set and available for reading by the caller

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getMode()
    Accessor: Returns the mode of the game 0,1,2 or 3 pre-conditions The game mode is set post-conditions The game mode is sent to View and is between 0-3
    void
    init()
    Transformer: Initializes the mod selection window and adds the components
    void
    initTeliko()
    Transformer: Initializes the field teliko (JFrame) and adding on it the required UI
    void
    setBackground()
    Transformer: Sets the Background for the Menu Screen
    JPanel
    setConfirmButton()
    Transformer: Creates the confirm/cancel buttons for the selection of the mods
    JPanel
    setRadioButtons()
    Transformer: Creates the radio buttons for the selection of the mods
    JPanel
    setStartingScreen()
    Transformer: Creates the starting Screen panel adding the UI which is the first screen the user sees
    JPanel
    setTitle()
    Transformer: Creates the title panel
